text.text: Slotless modifiers do not require slots, unlike all other types of modifiers. This typically means the modifier either has some tradeoff or the effect is minor.
One notable type of slotless modifiers is bonus modifiers, which grant additional modifier slots. Many exist that grant more upgrade slots, and I am told some even exist to grant more ability slots.
Thruul M'Gon's Puny Smelting has a full list of slotless modifiers available on tools, along with the Encyclopedia of Tinkering.
